item.title: Introduction to Hardware Accelerators
item.description: Preface Link to heading Welcome to the first blog in the “Hardware Accelerators 101” Series â€” An attempt made by me into a deep dive surrounding conventional computer architecture, the need for accelerator architectures, and specialised computing engines that are redefining the performance and computing journey! Hardware Accelerators: Why Your CPU Isn’t Enough Anymore? Link to heading The End of Easy Performance Gains Link to heading For decades, we’ve relied on Moore’s Law and Dennard Scaling to automatically improve our computing performance.

item.title: About
item.description: Hello there! My name is Kunal Kishore Link to heading A junior year undergraduate (3rd year) ECE student from PES University, Bangalore. Avid Embedded Systems,Micro-architecture and HPC geek. An amateur runner. Research Interests: Link to heading Computer Architecture High Performance Computing Embedded Systems Hardware Software Co-Design Work: Link to heading Research Intern @ RISE LABS, IIT-Madras Working on AXI4 related issues for Shakti C-Class Core.
